room_title: Escape room "The Illusionist" by Just Escape in New York
review: This was my first escape room challenge.  It was a great experience.  Parking is not bad, local to us and convenient to get to.We did The Illusionist, which was a medium challenge level.  We were able to escape in under an hour.

room_title: Escape room "The Illusionist" by Just Escape in New York
review: My friends and I did the Illusionist room and had a great time. Casey was our game master and she was super nice and helpful. They had a lot of rooms to choose from. We will definitely be back!

room_title: Escape room "The Illusionist" by Just Escape in New York
review: My friends and I were very impressed by “Just Escape” and are so glad we went! The room we did, “The Illusionist,” was very detailed and well done, making it an enjoyable experience. We had such a great time trying to figure it out. Our game master, Nick, was great and very helpful. We'll definitely be coming back again!

room_title: Escape room "The Illusionist" by Just Escape in New York
review: Had a great time trying to escape the Illusionist. Would definitely go again!

room_title: Escape room "The Illusionist" by Just Escape in New York
review: We had a great time here! My husband and I did the Illusionist room and it was really fun! This place is nice, clean and fancy. We've done other rooms, and this one is the best! We will definitely go again!
